EmailTemplate.name: OSS_Webinar_10AM Improving your (legacy) Application with Spring.Reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar Reminder: Improving your (legacy) Application with Spring
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=There}}, We are looking forward to having you join us for today's webinar Improving your (legacy) Application with Spring with Marten Deinum. If you haven't done so yet, we recommend that you join a test meeting before the session to check your system and browser compatibility at http://www.webex.com/test-meeting.html. Event Details:
Date: Tuesday, May 12, 2015
North America: 10:00am PDT (San Francisco, GMT-07:00) Join the WebEx <https://pivotal-io.webex.com/pivotal-io/onstage/g.php?MTID=e6f26cd505e34d7e9f6717a9f5a4b9696> Dial In: US TOLL FREE+1-855-749-4750 US TOLL+1-415-655-0001 Show toll-free dialing restrictions
Access code: 669 895 644
Thank you,
